description:
### 11.16 blockdetect

Determines blockiness of frames without altering the input frames.

Based on Remco Muijs and Ihor Kirenko: "A no-reference blocking artifact
measure for adaptive video processing." 2005 13th European signal processing
conference.

The filter accepts the following options:

**period_min**

**period_max**

    Set minimum and maximum values for determining pixel grids (periods). Default values are [3,24]. 

**planes**

    Set planes to filter. Default is first only.
name: blockdetect

options.description: Set minimum and maximum values for determining pixel grids (periods). Default values are [3,24].
options.name: period_min

options.description: Set minimum and maximum values for determining pixel grids (periods). Default values are [3,24].
options.name: period_max

options.description: Set planes to filter. Default is first only.
options.name: planes
